para.text: There is established a Parking Enforcement Management Administration ("PEMA") within the Department, the purpose of which is to provide:
On-street parking enforcement services, including ticketing for parking violations, immobilization, and impoundment;
Removal of abandoned and dangerous vehicles; and
PEMA shall perform 3 primary organizational functions:
Removal of abandoned or dangerous vehicles from any public right-of-way, public space, or private property;
Enforcement of the District's parking regulations to promote vehicular safety and access to short-term parking at meters and long-term parking on residential streets; and
Immobilizing and impounding immobilization-eligible vehicles on public space and relocating illegally parked vehicles impeding public rights-of-way.
